sentences.en: We live in a multiracial society.
sentences.cn: 我们生活在一个多种族的社会里。

sentences.en: In Indiana, Iowa and South Dakota, the multiracial population increased by about 70 percent.
sentences.cn: 在印第安纳州，洛瓦和南达科他州，混血人口增加了大约70%。

sentences.en: The islanders have free education and health care. Their multiracial society is pretty harmonious.
sentences.cn: 不冷不热的天气，没有疟疾，岛民们享受免费教育和医疗，他们的多种族社会十分和谐。
